text.origin: Ana: Hola, ¿necesitas ayuda?
text.translation: Ана: Привет, тебе нужна помощь?

text.origin: Juan: Sí, estoy buscando la plaza del Mercado.
text.translation: Хуан: Да, я ищу рынок.

text.origin: Ana: La plaza está cerca, solo necesitas caminar dos calles.
text.translation: Ана: Площадь рядом, тебе нужно пройти всего две улицы.

text.origin: Juan: ¿Dos calles? No estoy seguro de cómo llegar.
text.translation: Хуан: Две улицы? Я не уверен, как туда добраться.

text.origin: Ana: No te preocupes. Sigue recto y gira a la derecha.
text.translation: Ана: Не волнуйся. Иди прямо и поверни направо.

text.origin: Juan: ¿Derecha en la tercera calle o en la segunda?
text.translation: Хуан: Направо на третьей улице или на второй?

text.origin: Ana: En la segunda calle, gira a la derecha.
text.translation: Ана: На второй улице, поверни направо.

text.origin: Juan: Muchas gracias. Me gustarían algunas recomendaciones.
text.translation: Хуан: Большое спасибо. Мне бы хотелось несколько рекомендаций.

text.origin: Ana: Hay un buen restaurante en la plaza.
text.translation: Ана: Есть хороший ресторан на площади.

text.origin: Juan: ¿Qué tipo de comida hay?
text.translation: Хуан: Какую еду там подают?

text.origin: Ana: Comida típica, como paella y tapas.
text.translation: Ана: Традиционная еда, такая как паэлья и тапас.

text.origin: Juan: Suena delicioso, quiero probar paella.
text.translation: Хуан: Звучит вкусно, я хочу попробовать паэлью.

text.origin: Ana: ¡Sí! Y hay una fuente bonita en el centro de la plaza.
text.translation: Ана: Да! И в центре площади есть красивый фонтан.

text.origin: Juan: ¿Puedo jugar con tu perro?
text.translation: Хуан: Могу поиграть с твоей собакой?

text.origin: Ana: Claro, a mi perro le encanta jugar con pelotas.
text.translation: Ана: Конечно, моей собаке нравится играть с мячами.

text.origin: Juan: ¡Es un perro muy divertido!
text.translation: Хуан: Это очень веселая собака!

text.origin: Ana: Sí, tiene mucha energía.
text.translation: Ана: Да, у него много энергии.

text.origin: Juan: Bueno, después de jugar, iré a la plaza.
text.translation: Хуан: Хорошо, после игры я пойду на площадь.

text.origin: Ana: ¡Perfecto! Diviértete.
text.translation: Ана: Отлично! Удачи.

text.origin: Juan: ¡Gracias! Nos vemos después.
text.translation: Хуан: Спасибо! Увидимся потом.

prompt: You should provide dialog in Spanish level A2-B1, with translation into Russian. Place of dialog: park Context of dialog: Tourist asks how to get to the Market square, but the dog brings him a ball to play. Characters: First: Role: dog_owner Mood: calm Sex: femenino Description: student Second: Role: tourist Mood: frustrated Sex: masculino Description: student If some of dialog parameters are missed generate random values for them based on known parameters. Generate names for characters. Dialog should correspond following requirements: - each speach should be 1-3 sentences (use followgin form: [Character Name]: [Character turn]); - dialog should be split in paragraphs: for each speech add its own paragraph, e.g.: Alex: Hello! --- Bob: Hi! How do you do? - include at least 15-20 speach per character; - use numbers in words in Spanish; - sentences and paragraphs SHOULD NOT be empty. Check that the dialog includes at least 15 sentences. Check that each paragraph includes only one speech. Make a list of 20-25 words used in the dialog with translation into Russian according to the following requirements: - 5-7 verbs, 5-7 adjectives, 5-7 substantives, 5-7 adverbs; - choose the most hard words; - verbs should be in INFINITIVE form, adjectives in SINGLE MASCULINE form, and substantives in SINGLE form; - check that words are in the right forms described in the previous requirement; - check that the amount of words is at least 20; - the list should be SORTED alphabetically. Generate title in Spanish with translation into Russian for generated dialog, use style as in popular magazines. Check that title is in Spanish. Based on information in dialog add 5 questions about it to check how the student understood the dialog. Information in the dialog SHOULD BE sufficient to answer all questions correctly. Each question should have 4 variants of answers, 1-2 of them should have more than one correct answer. Check that correct options for answers are really correct. Add 3-5 tags to the result. Check that in the generated data there are no words in other languages than Spanish except proper nouns. Extract all proper nouns from the generated dialog. Proper nouns include names of specific people (except names of characters of generated dialog), places (e.g., regions like 'Caribe'), organizations, titles, or other named entities. Return the results as an array without duplicates. Perform an additional check to ensure that: - no words or phrases from languages other than Spanish (except translations into Russian) are included in the dialog, questions, or word lists; - Spanish words are used in correct grammatical forms: times, gender (masculine/femenin), sentences structure, etc.; - proper nouns are used only when culturally appropriate and relevant to the topic.
